item.title: ZYNEX INC 10-K
item.description: ZYNEX INC, which is in the Electromedical & Electrotherapeutic Apparatus [3845] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 22, 2022 had 20108 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 218 instances december - 198 instances 2021 - 192 instances 31 - 177 instances products - 171 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
